titleStmt.title: At the angel and crown in Basing-lane, being the second turning in Bread-street, from Cheapside, on the left hand, lives John Pechey, of long standing in the Colledge of Physicians in London.
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
